body.raw:
## Hello World

Welcome to my [digital garden](https://maggieappleton.com/garden-history/), the place where I'll be writing to organize my thinking about topics I'm curious about.

Those include:
- Personal agents
- How the web works
- More broadly, [**tools** for thoughts](https://maggieappleton.com/tools-for-thought/)

In terms of writing style, I'm especially fan of [explorable explanations](https://worrydream.com/ExplorableExplanations/), which are articles that you don't only read but also interact with.
